definition.text: The reason why you can't move is that scales are locked in the automatic mode so that you may easily find the data after your first data mining operation.

paragraphs.text: Setting the Time Scale in automatic mode forces the whole datetime range of available data into the chart.
To toggle between the various automatic modes and manual mode, hit Shift and make a gentle one-step roll with the wheel of your mouse on top of the time scale box.
Once you've taken care of that, you should be able to move freely on the X-axis, that is, the time axis of the chart. See the video on the next step for clarity.
